Andrea Conti officially signed with Parma earlier today. The former Atalanta full-back took the time to write a few words to the Rossoneri fans after his departure, this is what he wrote on his social media:

“There would be so many things to say about what I’ve felt in these almost 4 years but right now I can’t find the right words.
Dear Milan, thank you for welcoming me into your wonderful history full of charm and glory, thank you for giving me the opportunity to wear a shirt so prestigious that is dreamed of by many children but thank you above all for having introduced me to fantastic people that I will always keep in my heart!
I dreamed of a different path, I wanted to do more, but despite everything I always gave my best to honour the colours that I wore. It was a privilege!
Good luck with everything
Forever grateful”

Good luck Conti

繼續補強 帕爾馬有意簽下前AC米蘭箭頭

據意大利媒體報導，帕爾馬有意簽下哈化柏林前鋒比亞迪克（Krzysztof Piatek）。

在租借簽下AC米蘭右閘干迪（Andrea Conti）之後，帕爾馬在冬窗的引援腳步仍然未停止。據Transfermarkt報導，帕爾馬有意將哈化柏林前鋒比亞迪克帶回意甲。

在AC米蘭沒有獲得成功，這位波蘭前鋒近年的發展仍然不太如意，本賽季他為哈化柏林在和項賽事出戰17場比賽，貢獻4球2助攻。

據報，帕爾馬，熱拿亞和祖雲達斯等球隊都有意簽下比亞迪克。Football Italia更指出，祖雲達斯可能用貝拿斯迪基（Federico Bernardeschi ）和哈化柏林交換比亞迪克。

比亞迪克目前在Transfermarkt上的身價為2100萬歐元。

據報，帕爾馬，熱拿亞和祖雲達斯等球隊都有意簽下比亞迪克。Football Italia更指出，祖雲達斯可能用貝拿斯迪基（Federico Bernardeschi ）和哈化柏林交換比亞迪克。

比亞迪克目前在Transfermarkt上的身價為2100萬歐元。

阿特蘭大剛戰靠復任正選的前鋒路爾斯梅利爾建功，才逼和烏甸尼斯；該哥倫比亞射手亦取得今季意甲第10球，今場仍會先任正選。另一哥倫比亞鋒將杜雲沙柏達先任後備，上輪聯賽只以後備上陣的伊利錫則會擔正，與馬利路夫斯基負責側擊。

At the kick-off of Milan – Atalanta, Ibrahimovic will reach an important milestone: 600 overall league appearances in the different leagues played in his career. As for the goals, we are at 498 with the clubs in all competitions in 821 matches. He is a brace away from 500 goals.

Ibrahimovic has always won titles wherever he went, and perhaps he could do it again with the Rossoneri. It could be his best achievement. Zlatan himself said it: “This is his biggest challenge.” This was reported by Gazzetta dello Sport.

Stefano Pioli for Milan TV and Sky Sport:

About the match:

Atalanta deserved a victory. We had a good start to the game, but unfortunately we were the first to concede a goal. In fact, the second goal ended the game. We should have behaved much better in this situation. We should have done a lot more, but we have not succeeded. In some situations, we lacked a bit of precision and personality. At the first goal it was possible to intercept a cross earlier. If we hadn't conceded the second goal, the match might have lasted until the end. I am sorry for today's failure. We need to be more focused and more aware of our abilities. Now we have to start over and think about the next meeting.

About the winter Scudetto:

Our team is aware of the work performed. We are aware of our features and we know that we still have to develop. There are many strong teams in our league. If we want to achieve our goal, we must try even harder than before.

Will Tuesday's derby be groundbreaking?

I do not know. We will see. I'm not going to sleep tonight anyway.

About Mandzukić:

Mario showed a lot of intensity and skill on the pitch today. Today's game helped him increase his confidence on the pitch.
